addons.name: User Agent Switcher
addons.description: The User Agent Switcher extension adds a menu and a toolbar button to switch the user agent of a browser.
addons.fullDescription: The User Agent Switcher extension adds a menu and a toolbar button to switch the user agent of a browser.

screenshots.caption: The User Agent Switcher toolbar

addons.developerComments:
The best place for support is not in the reviews section below, but on the User Agent Switcher site:

http://chrispederick.com/work/user-agent-switcher/help/

addons.name: gtranslate
addons.description: With gtranslate you can translate any text in a web page just by selecting and right-clicking over it. The extension uses the Google translation services to translate the text.
addons.fullDescription:
With gtranslate you can translate any text in a webpage just by selecting and right-clicking over it. The addon uses the Google Translate service to translate the text.

gtranslate is not affiliated with Google Inc. in any way.

Features:

    Translates from/to the following languages: Afrikaans, Albanian, Arabic, Armenian, Azerbaijani, Basque, Belarusian, Bengali, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Catalan, Cebuano, Chinese Simplified, Chinese Traditional, Chichewa, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Esperanto, Estonian, Filipino, Finnish, French, Galician, Georgian, German, Greek, Gujarati, Haitian Creole, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi, Hmong, Hungarian, Icelandic, Igbo, Indonesian, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Korean, Lao, Latin, Latvian, Lithuanian, Macedonian, Malagasy, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Myanmar, Nepali, Norwegian, Persian, Punjabi, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Sesotho, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Somali, Spanish, Sundanese, Swahili, Swedish, Tajik, Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Welsh, Yiddish, Yoruba, and Zulu.
    Auto detect the language.
    Image descriptions and links can be translated too.

screenshots.caption: Right click on any selection, link or image to make the gtranslate menu appear
Open the menu to get the translation
Select the translation to get the full translation in a tooltip
Click on the translation to open the Google Translate page

addons.developerComments:
Mini-FAQ

Q: Why gtranslate only translates from a few languages?

A: gtranslate works using the languages offered at https://translate.google.com/ so until Google don't add support for more languages I can't do anything :)

Q: But Google added the language and it's not on the extension!

A: The languages are not automatically added, but manually. So it can take some time to appear.

Q: What's that "Detect Language" thing on the menu?

A: In Google's words "(an) option to help you automatically identify the language of the text you're trying to translate". It does what the "Detect page language" option was intended to do but better. If you plan to use that function you can disable "Detect page language" from the option menu.

Q: I have "Detect Language" selected but nothing gets translated. What happens?

A: Check if you have "Detect browser language" checked on the options window. Since this options overrides the destination language with the browser locale it may happen that the origin and the destination language are the same.

Q: The text I wan't to translate is too long and appears uncomplete in the translation box. How can I see a complete translation?

A: Click in the translation box and a new tab will be opened with the Google page with the full text.

Q: When I click on the translation to open it in a new tab it just opens a white page. What happened?

A: Look if you have the Image zoom extension installed. Seems like gtranslate and Image Zoom doesn't fit well together. To solve the problem, uninstall and re-install Image Zoom. If you still have the problem please contact me with the list of installed extensions.

Q: How can I contact the author?

A: bonjour+gtranslate@pierrebertet.net

addons.name: Tab Scope
addons.description: Preview and navigate tab contents through popup.
addons.fullDescription:
Shows a popup on tabs and enables you to preview and navigate tab contents through popup. Major features are:

* Real-time preview of tab contents
* Navigate (Back/Forward/Reload/Stop) through popup
* Scroll pages or frames in preview with mouse wheel
* Click links or buttons directly in preview
* Automatically show preview for tabs opened in background

For more info, please see http://www.xuldev.org/tabscope/

screenshots.caption: Popup and toolbar
Zoom preview
Background monitoring

addons.name: InstantFox Quick Search
addons.description:
Speed up your web search & search via your address bar

✔ get autocomplete ideas while typing
✔ get search results instantly as you type
✔ customize your own search-shortcuts

Instructional Video: http://y2u.be/W-BvOGf0kaM
Visit instantfox.net
addons.fullDescription:
InstantFox combines the Firefox address bar with the search box.
Save time by entering your search term right into your address bar:
• InstantFox provides you with automatic suggestions while you are typing so you only have to type the first letters of your search term.
• Search results appear instantly as you type to give you the fastest web search possible!

HowTo:
simply put: » w searchword « into your address bar to search Wikipedia for example.

There are many shortcuts for quicksearches via your address bar like:
g » Google or i » Google Images or m » Google Maps
w » Wikipedia
y » Youtube
a » Amazon
e » eBay
t » Twitter
wt » Weather Forecast and many more.

Features:
✔ Suggest: get auto-suggest ideas while typing
✔ Instant: get search results instantly as you type
✔ Customize: customize your own search-shortcuts
✔ Smart: Instantfox automatically uses the suggest-api of the choosen search engine
✔ Contextsearch: use the right-click contextmenu to quicksearch a highlighted keyword.

Customize:
Create your own shortcuts for the sites you are visiting most.
Customize all Instantfox features for your own needs in the configuration panel.

Like it?
If you like the idea of instantfox, we are happy about a 5-star rating!
Bugs? Feedback? Need Help? Use our FAQ or drop us a line at feedback@instantfox.net.

Check out our instructional video on Youtube
Hit us up on: Instantfox.net or Twitter or Facebook

screenshots.caption: use shortcuts like (g,m,i,w,y,a,e) to search via your addressbar » instant + with suggest «
Configuration Panel: choose your language + add your own search-plugins!
search highlighted word via rightclick!
Quick Search with Wikipedia Suggest!

addons.developerComments:
Bugs? Feedback? Need Help? Use our FAQ or drop us a line at feedback@instantfox.net.

Our vision is, that you use your addressbar as a smart commandline for almost everything.

addons.name: StumbleUpon
addons.description: StumbleUpon is the easiest way to discover new and interesting photos, videos, web pages and more, recommended by a community of experts. Tell us what you are interested in and we recommend page after page of amazing stuff you’d never expect to see.
addons.fullDescription:
StumbleUpon | a more interesting world

StumbleUpon is the easiest way to discover new and interesting stuff from all corners of the world. Simply click the “Stumble!” button, and we’ll recommend page after page of the best stuff on the Internet. We guarantee there is something we have that you have never seen! Share what you find with anyone via email and Facebook. Organize your likes and bookmarks into lists to share with your followers.

Start exploring the remarkable world around you. Get ready to go beyond what you already know into an endless stream of fun.

screenshots.caption: Our goal is to show you the best of what the web has to offer based upon your interests.
With single click, we will take you to where you have never been. You'll see something new with every click.
When you stumble upon a page you love, like it! We will bookmark and store your likes, so you can find it later.
Organize and categorize the pages you find into lists. With a list, you can tell a story, such as "funny photos" or "inspiring quotes".
Share what you find on StumbleUpon with your friends and family. We guarantee they will enjoy your discoveries.

addons.developerComments:
Do not report problems with StumbleUpon to this page. Submit them here:
http://www.stumbleupon.com/feedback.php

addons.name: Arctic Glow
addons.description:
Varying shades of blue with arctic ice effects.
It will integrate with most extensions by default.
addons.fullDescription:
Most extensions will simply inherit theme colors and all is fine.
On the other hand some extensions need to change certain colors.
In most cases those changes will be fine but they can sometimes be unreadable on dark or montone themes.

I test and fix what I can but with over 7,000 extensions there is no way I can keep up with the changes on my own.
If you find a problem such as unreadable text then please email me about it.
I will fix and release it as soon as I can.
If it is urgent I will try to give you a custom release within a day or so.

screenshots.caption: Extensions
Downloads
Preferences/Options
Browser & Sidebar

addons.developerComments: With the up coming release of Firefox 4 I've gone back to scratch and rebuilt Arctic Glow from the new Default theme. I am also going right back through testing on all the extensions I can. Having done a few things differently I am pleased to say that most extensions just work. With that said, if you find an issue such as light text on a light background (unreadable) then please email me about it. I'm more than happy to fix these issues as quick as I can.

addons.name: Adblock Plus
addons.description:
Blocks annoying video ads on YouTube, Facebook ads, banners and much more.

Adblock Plus blocks all annoying ads, and supports websites by not blocking unobtrusive ads by default (configurable).
addons.fullDescription:
Adblock Plus allows you to regain control of the internet and view the web the way you want to. The add-on is supported by over forty filter subscriptions in dozens of languages which automatically configure it for purposes ranging from removing online advertising to blocking all known malware domains. Adblock Plus also allows you to customize your filters with the assistance of a variety of useful features, including a context option for images, a block tab for Flash and Java objects, and a list of blockable items to remove scripts and stylesheets.

Starting with Adblock Plus 2.0 there is an option in Filter Preferences to allow some non-intrusive advertising. The goal is to support websites using non-intrusive ways to advertise and to encourage more websites to do the same. Read more

screenshots.caption: Easily remove all annoying ads from Firefox.
Adblock Plus can do more than adblocking. Enable powerful features in one click.
Clean up your Facebook experience with Adblock Plus.
Adblock Plus even removes those annoying 30-second video ads on YouTube.
Remove all annoying blinking banners!
Browse the web as it once used to be.
Please help us by reporting bugs.
You can even create your own blocking lists to customize the web to your exact needs.

addons.name: Google Docs Viewer (PDF, DOCX, PPTX, XLSX, etc...)
addons.description: View publicly-accessible PDF, DOCX, PPTX, XLSX, among other files online with Google Docs by only 2 clicks. Click as usual for your default viewer. Support bookmarked URLs. Security and your explicit viewing intention are always honored.
addons.fullDescription:
To open a publicly accessible file, right click on a hyperlink and then click "Open Link in Google Docs Viewer".

Supported File Formats of Google Docs Viewer:
* Adobe PDF (.PDF)
* Microsoft Word (.DOC and .DOCX)
* Microsoft Excel (.XLS and .XLSX)
* Microsoft PowerPoint (PPT, .PPTX)
* Apple Pages (.PAGES)
* Adobe Illustrator (.AI)
* Adobe Photoshop (.PSD)
* Autodesk AutoCad (.DXF)
* Scalable Vector Graphics (.SVG)
* PostScript (.EPS, .PS)
* TrueType (.TTF)
* XML Paper Specification (.XPS)
* Tagged Image File Format (.TIF, .TIFF)
* Archive file types (.ZIP and .RAR)
* Text and Markup/COde (.TXT, .CSS, .HTML, .PHP, .C, .CPP, .H, .HPP, .JS)

Unlike similar plugins,

    The add-on is written with extensive care to minimize footprints.
    The add-on works on bookmarked hyperlinks. (in response to kfdickey's and ffffffffffffffffff's comments)
    We preserve the integrity of web documents by not rewriting URLs. The risk of messing up your important websites is eliminated.
    The add-on works with all URLs returned by Google search results. We also accept URLs that don't appear to be among the supported file types (ex., http://example.com/?getpdf=12345). What you need to do is to simply confirm an additional dialog indicating that you want to view it intentionally.
    We are pro-security in the sense that the intended protocol of a viewing file is always honored. For instance, you'll connect to the Google Docs Viewer over HTTPS if a file is found at https://example.com/file.pdf . So, eavesdropper doesn't know what file you're viewing as with your default file viewer.

screenshots.caption: Right click to open the file with Google Docs Viewer in a new tab/window.
A new tab is opened to display a PDF file with the Google Docs Viewer.
The add-on works on bookmarked hyperlinks.
Options are available to cater your specific needs.

addons.name: PDF Download
addons.description: Use PDF Download to do whatever you like with PDF files on the Web. Regain control and eliminate browser problems, view PDFs directly in Firefox as HTML, and use the all-new Web-to-PDF toolbar to save and share Web pages as high-quality PDF files.
addons.fullDescription:
PDF Download by Nitro PDF Software is the leading tool for handling, viewing and creating Web-based PDF files and is enjoyed by millions of Firefox users every day. The browser extension removes the pain you can experience when you encounter PDF files online, reducing browser crashes, speeding up the display of a PDF's content, and letting you convert any (unsecured) Web page into a high-quality PDF that's great for archiving, printing and sharing.

* View PDF online (NEW). Convert PDF to an image and display it in the browser for quick viewing.
* Convert Web pages to PDF. Convert any (unsecured) Web pages to great looking PDF files, and then save, share, print or archive them.
* View PDF as HTML. View the contents of PDF files faster and eliminate browser problems by instantly converting any Web-based PDF to a browser-friendly HTML Web page.
* Control PDF files in Firefox. Stop crashes and get the upper hand on Web-based PDF files by automating and controlling how your Firefox or Flock browsers deal with them.
* Works in your language. Through the help of our users, PDF Download is now available in 19 languages and counting.

PDF Download includes the 'SmartLinks' functionality. SmartLinks helps you discover new things by automatically inserting relevant links to interesting, high-quality content. To enable this feature, accept the SmartLinks Terms of Service when installing PDF Download. You can later disable or remove SmartLinks from the Firefox Tools menu. Learn more about SmartLinks at http://pdf-download.getsmartlinks.com/, or see frequently asked questions at http://url-fixer.getsmartlinks.com/faq.
addons.developerComments:
*NOTE*
We will be adding an option to allow users to disable the PDF Download icon from the status bar as soon as it is ready.

Also for users using locale languages, we have fixed the bug in v3.0.0.0 which was reported by users. Download 3.0.0.1 to resolve this issue.

For more information (faq & forum) see http://www.pdfdownload.org

addons.name: MushroomKingdom
addons.description: A theme for the Super Mario Bros. fans!
addons.fullDescription:
MushroomKingdom is a theme for all of the Super Mario Bros. fans out there. It features a landscape-style background, colorful icons with personality, and pipe scrollbars (coming soon). Large icons (32px) only for now.

I decided to create this when I ran across the older Mario Bros. 3 theme. The main difference between that theme and this one, is that I created all of the graphics used throughout. No use of actual game sprites or graphics.
--------------------------------------------------------
Oh, one other thing. This theme is released for all platforms. However, PLEASE DO NOT RATE BASED ON OS SUPPORT. I do not have Mac OSX and couldn't see myself being able to buy it for the sake of testing themes anytime soon. I'd happily accept donations to put towards a Mac though :) Otherwise, until I find a reasonable solution, please refrain from basing your opinion upon OS support. Thank you.
------------------------------------------------------

addons.name: Omnibar
addons.description: Integrates location bar and search bar into one. Shows search and url suggestions. Quickly switch search engine using search keywords. Provides different auto-complete popup styles for compact displays.
addons.fullDescription:
**Firefox has added native support for suggestions in urlbar. Support for newer versions of Firefox is not planned. If you would like to add support for newer version or take over development, send me an email.**

Integrates Location bar and Search bar into one. Search directly using location bar. Quickly switch engines using search engine keywords. Supports searching multiple search engines for same query using advanced operator (see below).

One can search from location bar using search engine keywords. When using keywords, the location bar displays the intended search engine name to be searched with. fe,

y [your search query]

Suggestions are shown for search queries as well as popular urls.

Provides more compact styles for autocomplete popup.

Advanced search operator can be used to dynamically select your search engine. fe,

@engine1,engine2 [your search query]

or, if you prefer to give engine name at the end:
[your search query] @engine1,engine2

e.g.

@google , yahoo [your search query]
[your search query]@google , yahoo

or using shorthand,

[your search query]@g, ama
@g, ama [your search query]

Search engine keywords can be used with or without the operator. For example, if "e1" is a key word "engine1", then one can search Yahoo and engine1 with:
@y,e1 [your search query]

File path completions are shown with simple wildcard support. e.g. on Windows "c:\Doc*\*\App" should list the contents of "c:\Documents and Settings\[usernames]\Application Data"

Also provides different styles (slimmer) for auto-complete popup.

Problems, bugs and requests:
If you find problems and bugs or feature requests discuss at the discussion board or email me.

NOTE:
Some intranet domains name need to be prefixed with http: or should end with /. If you need to get back the original behavior, disable the "default search" option from Omnibar preferences.

screenshots.caption: search autocomplete
url suggestions
another way to multi-search, a different query syntax

addons.developerComments: Omnibar is not going to be supported for Firefox 43+ versions since Firefox is going to natively support search suggestions.

addons.name: Mozilla Firefox hotfix
addons.description: This official add-on enables Firefox to provide quick fixes for selected issues.
addons.fullDescription: This official add-on enables Firefox to provide quick fixes for selected issues. There is no need to install this add-on; starting in Firefox 11, it will be automatically installed. For more information, see: https://wiki.mozilla.org/Features/Desktop/Add-on_hotfix
